#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
long long int n,t,x,m;

cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>n>>m;
    if((n+m)%5==0)
    {
       x=(n+m)/5;
       if (abs(n-2*x)>abs(m-3*x))
       cout<<abs(m-3*x)<<endl;
       else
       cout<<abs(n-2*x)<<endl;
    }
    else
    cout<<"-1"<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
